title: Best of The Program | Guests: Peter Schweizer & Giancarlo Sopo | 7/14/21
description:
Glenn and Stu review what the new GOP-pushed voting laws actually do — and why they’re anything but "21st-century Jim Crow," as President Biden claimed. The Texas Democrats who fled their state are so brave. And great singers. Author Peter Schweizer joins to argue that Hunter Biden’s new art career is “no doubt” a money-laundering scheme and review what he’s discovered on Hunter’s laptop. Media strategist Giancarlo Sopo shares his insight on the Cuba protests and what sources on the ground have told him.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
